meanings.definition: The time at which one typically goes to bed.
meanings.sent1: My bedtime is 9 o'clock every night.
meanings.sent2: I always feel sleepy at bedtime.
meanings.sent3: At bedtime, my cat likes to snuggle up in my bed.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkle in the sky at bedtime.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to brush your teeth before bedtime.

meanings.definition: The act of going to bed.
meanings.sent1: I always look forward to bedtime.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, bedtime is a welcome relief.
meanings.sent3: My dog does a little dance before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The city streets quiet down at bedtime.
meanings.sent5: I like to read a book before bedtime.
